Comments_List: an understanding of communist and post-communist Polish film, women in cinema, and understanding of censorship in Polish film

I think this being a class that few film students take, it's difficult to succeed writing papers in this course. If there was a paper writing workshop prior to the midterm and final paper, that would be very useful.

strengths- such interesting films, prof is really nice 
weaknesses- only one screening a week sometimes made it difficult to view the films
Professor Illakowicz is undoubtedly the greatest strength of this course. Her passion for the subject colors and enlivens every discussion. Amazing films taught by an amazing professor!
Yes! The films we watched were all so different and interesting.
Yes! This course is a must take!
